trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_00<tab>Xeerol Ja's next idea may be her juiciest yet.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_01<tab>After three successful prototypes, Xeerol Ja reveals her most ambitious desire yet: blending a beverage for the Pelupelu, expert brewers themselves. Their mate tea already serves as a popular source of nutrition, but Xeerol Ja suggests a trip to Wachunpelo to see if any hidden health concerns are plaguing the Pelupelu.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_02<tab>Upon your arrival in Wachunpelo, Halnaruk expresses his eagerness to exchange tongueflaps with the locals. Surely someone will have the insights you need to conceive a worthy concoction.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_03<tab>You learn about the history of several classic Pelupelu beverages. How this information might serve your own juicemaking endeavor remains to be seen, but Xeerol Ja's arrival in Wachunpelo is imminent. Maybe she will have some ideas.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_04<tab>Thus far, it seems nothing you've managed to glean from the locals has led Xeerol Ja to a juicy epiphany. Still, it's possible Halnaruk might have found a lead...whether he realizes it or not.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_05<tab>Halnaruk's discovery is that of a Pelupelu experiencing all the symptoms of someone who drank too much mezcal. Xeerol Ja sends the fellow on his way with a glass of water and lecture on the virtues of hydration, but not before he misunderstands her concerns as one of a physician. Halnaruk is all too eager to support the flattering claims, insisting that Xeerol Ja is every bit the healer she once aspired to be, but these words bring her no joy. She confesses that the reason she never became a chirurgeon was due to her utter lack of magical talents─an unthinkable handicap for a member of the Boonewa clan. She can never achieve her dreams because she is inherently broken; and with such a declaration, Xeerol Ja excuses herself, her head hung in shame.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_06<tab>As much as Halnaruk regrets his thoughtless words, he's determined to lift Xeerol Ja's spirits. From his bulging pack, he produces a kukuru pod and bids you make some delicious kukuru pulp juice from it. Here's hoping the finished product tastes better than the name sounds...
※In the event you lose the ingredients or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Halnaruk.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_07<tab>Xeerol Ja gratefully accepts the kukuru pulp juice and marvels at the taste, wondering why something so soothing is not a more popular beverage in the city. Halnaruk explains that kukuru beans are more highly valued than their pods since they create chocolate─but he vows never to underestimate a kukuru pod again. Both have their strengths, regardless of societal opinion. Taking his meaning, Xeerol Ja's eyes brighten and she resolves to keep trying, for the sake of her customers and for the sake of Xeerol Ja Juicecraft. It's back to Tuliyollal with the lot of you─there are drinks to be made!

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SEQ_08<tab>Back in her own shop, Xeerol Ja seems more motivated than ever to develop a drink for the Pelupelu. Research takes time, however, so you may have to wait until she has more juicy details to spill...
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Halnaruk in Wachunpelo.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TODO_01<tab>Gather information in Wachunpelo.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Xeerol Ja.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Halnaruk.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Halnaruk again.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize kukuru pulp juice <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the kukuru pulp juice <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Xeerol Ja)) /var>.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Xeerol Ja in Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_000<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh! Our Hanuhanu juicymix will bring happyfeels and energy to featherfriends!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_000<tab>So far, all our new menu items are proving popular. My sales are recovering already.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_001<tab>But considering the population of Tuliyollal, our greatest challenge yet lies ahead of us.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_002<tab>It's the Pelupelu─I want to make a juice for them, but they're formidable beverage brewers themselves. I'm not sure what I could offer to compete with their mate, coffee, and mezcal.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_003<tab>Mate in particular is renowned for its health benefits, which may explain why I've never heard of chronic ailments affecting them.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_005<tab>Pelupelu drinks are also flavorstrong, like tastypunch for mouth!

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_006<tab>If the Pelupelu have their own health and hydration well in hand, all the better. But if some problem is being overlooked, I'd like to help discover a solution.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_008<tab>To that end, I was hoping you two would join me on a trip to Urqopacha.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_009<tab>Halnaruk will sniff out the Pelupelu's problems. That way Xeerol Ja can solve them with her juicymix!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_010<tab>Thank you! Go on ahead and start asking around. I'll be along after I close up shop.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_011<tab>Halnaruk will see <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> in Wachunpelo!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_015<tab>Look for Halnaruk when you get to Wachunpelo. I promise, I'll be right along!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_020<tab>Pfffkohhh... Halnaruk is relieved to see <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> did not get wanderlost.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_021<tab>Pelupelu are renowned drinkshakers and brewdrippers─but are they of purehealth?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_023<tab>Halnaruk and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will trade tongueflaps with the locals to find out. Tell Xeerol Ja when she arrives!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_024<tab>Halnaruk has learned that Pelupelu drink mezcal like world-ending is imminent. What has <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> learned?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_PELUPELU04986D_000_025<tab><hic> Nothing hits the spot quite like mezcal!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_QOBLI_000_030<tab>You want to learn about the drinks we brew? Say no more! I could talk endlessly about our coffee.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_QOBLI_000_031<tab>Our coffee plants are native to an island off the southeastern coast of Yok Tural.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_QOBLI_000_032<tab>When our predecessors had their first taste of the drink, they became infatuated with its scent, its taste, and the fact that it kept them unbelievably focused. They didn't hesitate to ship cuttings home for cultivation.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_QOBLI_000_033<tab>Luckily, those plants took well to the soil here─but the coffee they yield tastes completely different! Isn't that something?

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_QOBLI_000_034<tab>As it turns out, climate has a profound effect on the balance of acidity, richness, and bitterness of a bean. Makes me eager to try growing these plants in a variety of places, just to see how the flavor changes!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_WAVVLU_000_035<tab>Sure, I'm happy to tell you about our famous beverages. Mate in particular is of great importance to our community.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_WAVVLU_000_036<tab>Only certain crops can grow at high altitudes, so for a time, our diet was deeply unbalanced.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_WAVVLU_000_037<tab>But once we started growing and drinking mate, our health woes went away! It has all the nutrients we'll ever need─I never go a day without it, myself.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TSUVLI_000_040<tab>Mezcal, you say? It's a liquor distilled from the juice of agave leaves.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TSUVLI_000_041<tab>They say a traveling merchant brought the distillation method to Urqopacha after learning it in Xak Tural. Needless to say, our livelihood has never been the same.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_QOBLI_000_045<tab>Coffee doesn't just taste good─it keeps your mind as sharp as a knife! As cunning as an alpaca! It's the perfect drink!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_WAVVLU_000_046<tab>Any health problems we had are a thing of the past, thanks to mate.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_TSUVLI_000_047<tab>We make our mezcal locally, using the agaves close at hand.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_050<tab>Sorry I'm late, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Have you and Halnaruk discovered anything?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_051<tab>Some fascinating points! The Pelupelu's most popular beverages are not without their history, I see.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_053<tab>If only this gave me answers instead of more questions. What could I possibly offer in juice that the Pelupelu don't already have?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_054<tab>I wonder what Halnaruk managed to glean... Let's go and meet up with him.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_PELUPELU04986D_000_060<tab><hic>
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_061<tab>What's the matter with <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Xeerol Ja! This Pelupelu is all wearybushed! What can we do to hand-lend?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_PELUPELU04986D_000_071<tab>Oooh, my head... <hic> Feels like it's in a vise...
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_072<tab>Ah. I think I recognize these symptoms...
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_PELUPELU04986D_000_073<tab>I'm fine, miss... <hic> A spot of mate will have me on my feet in no time... <hic>
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_074<tab>Could you wait here a moment? I'll be back with the beverage this gentleman <var 1A 02 /var>actually<var 1A 01 /var> needs.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_PELUPELU04986D_000_075<tab>Oh, I feel so much better! What in the world was that cold, crisp refreshment you gave me!?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_076<tab>Surely you recognize the taste of <var 1A 02 /var>water<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_077<tab>If you're going to drink that much, you need to hydrate properly! Mate may be good for you, but it can't cure all ills!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_100_077<tab>And for the ills it can't...
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_PELUPELU04986D_000_078<tab>Just as you say, doctor! Much obliged for the remedy.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_079<tab>I-I'm not a doctor...
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_080<tab>But Halnaruk thinks so! Xeerol Ja's curefind and healcare for that drinkdrunk were perfect. As sharpskilled as a professional!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_081<tab>Xeerol Ja should be a doctor! Should be a chirurgeon! Xeerol Ja <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> good enough!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_084<tab>Perhaps when it comes to book knowledge.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_085<tab>But a chirurgeon must also be proficient in the arcane arts, for which my aptitude is...abysmal.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_086<tab>I was born into a clan valued for their magicks, but I possess close to none. Can you imagine how my family reacted when they discovered how utterly incapable I am?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_088<tab>What use is a Boonewa who can't use magic? I was a failure before I even started. Defective.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_089<tab>Not true! Xeerol Ja makes juicymixes that bring great happyfeels to many people! Xeerol Ja isn't useless or a failure or defective!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_090<tab>You're kind to say such things. But they don't change the reality that I lost my dreams to my own deficiencies.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_091<tab>I'm sorry, but all this talk of the past is... I think I need some time to myself.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_092<tab>Xeerol Ja...lost her dreams?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_093<tab>Halnaruk needs to think... Halnaruk needs to tongueflap! Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_095<tab>Sorry, but I need some time to myself.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_100<tab>Pfff... Kooohhh... Halnaruk can tell he gave Xeerol Ja hurtyfeels with his bluntwords.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_101<tab>But even without magic-might, Xeerol Ja still sweatworks every day to give people healthydrinks. Halnaruk thinks Xeerol Ja is a juicymix hero!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_102<tab>Now it is our turn to make a special juicymix─one that easecalms the heart. One sip and Xeerol Ja will feel happyproud again!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_103<tab>Luckily, Halnaruk has just the thing for drinkblending─Yok kukuru pods!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_100_103<tab>Kukuru pods are usually gatherpicked for the beans inside. But today we make no chocolate─today we squeeze the pods for juicypulp!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_104<tab>Kukuru pulp juice! Tasty in name, gluey in texture!

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_105<tab>Make a bestgood glass for Xeerol Ja and deliver it directly! Halnaruk has plenty of Yok kukuru pods, so if <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> poormixes, just truthtell!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_100_105<tab>Squeeze the pods for kukuru pulp juice! It should be just the goodthing to bring Xeerol Ja more happyfeels.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_106<tab>Is that a glass of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s bestgood kukuru pulp juice? Take it to Xeerol Ja!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_107<tab>Did <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> make a poormix? That's all right. Halnaruk has more kukuru pods for craftymaking!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_110<tab>Hm? What's that sweet smell?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_111<tab>You made this for me? That's very kind. I'm happy to have a taste.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_112<tab>Tangy, sweet...and a consistent, reassuring texture. A very soothing drink.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_113<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Did Xeerol Ja try the juicymix?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_114<tab>It was lovely, thank you. What's in it, if I may ask?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_115<tab>The juicypulp of kukuru pods!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_116<tab>Really? I'm shocked I haven't heard of such a juice in Tuliyollal. You'd think something this tasty would warrant more popularity.

TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_118<tab>Kukuru beans sell for much jinglyshine. But kukuru <var 1A 02 /var>pods<var 1A 01 /var> have heavybulk, so stuffseekers often scooptake the beans and leave the rest.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_120<tab>That makes sense. The kukuru pod's value lies in the beans it carries, after all.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_121<tab>But kukuru beans can't make this tastyfresh juicymix. The way Halnaruk sees it, the whole pod is worthygood, just as it is!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_123<tab>Xeerol Ja might not become a chirurgeon, but she is already a master juicekeep. Her family should pridesee her accomplishments─magic or no magic!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_A2_000_001<tab>Think of your customers. How much happiness you've given them.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_A2_000_002<tab>Think of how far Xeerol Ja Juicecraft has come! You can't give up now!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_124<tab>You're right... You're both right. All this time, I thought my dreams of becoming a healer had come to naught, and I blamed myself for it.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_125<tab>But I've watched Mamool Ja and Moblins and Hanuhanu drink my juice and...and tell me that it helped them in some small way.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_126<tab>Being a Boonewa who can't use magic feels humiliating. And I'm sure it still will for some time yet.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_100_126<tab>But your faith in me makes me want to keep trying.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_127<tab>Thank you both for steering me true.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_128<tab>Now, I'm afraid my personal detour has cost us no little time. Let's return to Tuliyollal and revisit what clues we gleaned regarding the Pelupelu.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_HALNARUK_000_130<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh! Xeerol Ja's spirits seem airylight! Thanks to Halnaruk's juicypulp, yes?
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_140<tab>Back safe and sound! Thank you again for accompanying me.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_141<tab>That drunk fellow made me realize there are, in fact, some ailments for which the Pelupelu's current diet lacks a solution.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_142<tab>Once I've researched the matter further, I'll be in touch.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_XEEROLJA_000_143<tab>As the proud owner of Xeerol Ja Juicecraft, I can see my path clearly now. I won't let you or my customers down!
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SYSTEM_000_144<tab>The next request will be available from Xeerol Ja upon reaching level 98 as an alchemist or culinarian.
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SYSTEM_000_145<tab>In order to undertake the subsequent quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The Long Road to Xak Tural.”
TEXT_KINGLA305_04986_SYSTEM_000_146<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
